item.title: Void Crew coming to PS5, Xbox Series on September 4
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Xbox Series

Currently available for PC.

Publisher Focus Entertainment and developer Hutlihut Games will release cooperative space action game Void Crew for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series on September 4, the companies announced.

Void Crew first launched in Early Access for PC via Steam on November 25 on September 7, 2023, followed by a full release on November 25, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via Focus Entertainment:

Bring order to the galaxy in Void Crew!

As a crew, you’ll take on the role of Pilot, Gunner, Engineer, or Scavenger to face the threats lurking deep in METEM’s domain. Your mission? Stand against the mysterious HOLLOW, an alien force like no other, to restore order—and try not to panic!

Jump from objective to objective, expand your ship’s loadout on the fly, and survive epic space battles against swarms of enemies and massive bosses. Void Crew challenges you to customize and upgrade your spaceship in the face of relentless foes. Get ready for chaos: in the Void, the only plan is improvisation. Will your teamwork keep the ship together, or will you die trying?

It’s time to find out—the galaxy awaits your Pilgrimage… and may METEM Preserve You!



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/07/void-crew-coming-to-ps5-xbox-series-on-september-4

item.title: Hello Kitty Island Adventure new physical editions announced for PS5, Switch
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Switch

Available in standard and "Gift Box" editions.

Sunblink will release new physical editions of Hello Kitty Island Adventure for PlayStation 5 and Switch on August 29 across North America, Europe, and Asia, the developer announced.

The standard edition, which will be available for both PlayStation 5 and Switch, will cost $39.99 / £34.99 / €39.99.

The “Gift Box Edition,” which will be available for Switch, will cost $59.99 / €59.99 / £52.99. It includes the physical Deluxe Edition (includes the base game plus over 300 unique items and rewards, including Deluxe Starter and Crafting Bundles), a printed Critter and Fish guide, a set of exclusive collectable cards, Tophat’s Memories, and a premium double-sided poster, all packed into a specially designed collector’s box.

Hello Kitty Island Adventure first launched for Apple Arcade on July 28, 2023, before its expansion to Switch and PC via Steam on January 30, 2025. PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 versions are planned for a digital release in 2025, although today’s press release does not confirm whether the PlayStation 5 version’s physical edition release is planned to align with the digital release.

View a new set of pack shots at the gallery.

Pack Shots

  • ❮
  • ❯


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/07/hello-kitty-island-adventure-new-physical-editions-announced-for-ps5-switch

item.title: Famitsu Sales: 7/7/25 – 7/13/25
item.content:encoded:
• PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Mario Kart World continues to dominate.

Famitsu has published its estimated physical game software data for Japan for week of July 7, 2025 to July 13, 2025.

PATAPON 1+2 REPLAY was the highest selling new release of the week, opening at 8,871 retail copies sold on Switch. The PlayStation 5 and PC versions were only released digitally.

On the hardware side, Switch 2 sold 71,885 units, the Switch family sold 13,411 units, the PlayStation 5 family sold 7,262 units, the Xbox Series family sold 247 units, and the PlayStation 4 family sold 30 units.

Get the full sales charts below.

Software Sales (followed by lifetime sales)

  1. [SW2] Mario Kart World (Nintendo, 06/05/25) – 65,853 (1,365,072)
  2. [NSW] Tamagotchi Plaza (Bandai Namco, 06/26/25) – 13,736 (140,198)
  3. [NSW] 1+2 REPLAY (Bandai Namco, 07/10/25) – 8,871 (New)
  4. [NSW] Mario Kart 8 Deluxe (Nintendo, 04/28/17) – 6,944 (6,373,204)
  5. [NSW] Animal Crossing: New Horizons (Nintendo, 03/20/20) – 5,824 (8,166,316)
  6. [NSW] Super Mario Party Jamboree (Nintendo, 10/17/24) – 5,478 (1,343,780)
  7. [NSW] Minecraft (Microsoft, 06/21/18) – 5,022 (3,933,889)
  8. [PS5] Death Stranding 2: On the Beach (SIE, 06/26/25) – 4,162 (87,597)
  9. [SW2] Tamagotchi Plaza (Bandai Namco, 06/26/25) – 4,095 (36,695)
  10. [NSW] FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time (LEVEL-5, 05/21/25) – 3,583 (144,758)

Rankings 11 to 30 will be announced on July 18.

  1. [NSW] Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma (Marvelous, 06/05/25) –
